attributes.action: Withdraw the £115000 public duties cost allowance (PDCA) to Prime Ministers
attributes.additional_details: This country has a right to fair governance and accountability of fiscal spending. This type of payment should be controlled with a far greater vigour and reflective of a PM servicing a full term of office.
attributes.background:
Withdraw or Revise the right to public duties cost allowance (PDCA) to Prime Ministers spending less than a 5 year term in office.
During a cost of living crisis, paying such huge amounts is not a fair use of public spending.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625646

If you want this allowance to be ended entirely, we could accept a petition requesting this.
